name: Ships Of The Exiled
description:
----------------------------------------
IMPORTANT: This mod is currently in an EXPERIMENTAL stage!
Bugs will occur; make sure to read the docs before installing this mod.
----------------------------------------

Arrr matey! 'Tis time to avast and set sail!

This mod allows you to build and customize ships, and sail across rivers and seas, alone or with a crew.

Check the docs for a full overview of features this mod offers.
Please use the discord for any questions, or to report any issues you run into.

Documentation: https://thraxerrrr.github.io/ShipsOfTheExiled
Discord: https://discord.gg/FtWrKAZ
author: Thraxerrrr
